rt

Interface Intersectable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LightGeometry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggregate, CSGCube, CSGDodecahedron, CSGInfiniteCylinder, CSGNode, CSGPlane, CSGSolid, IntersectableList, Mesh, MeshTriangle, Plane, PointLight

    public interface Intersectable
    An intersectable supports ray-surface intersection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HitRecord intersect(Ray r)
      Implement ray-surface intersection in this method.

    • Method Detail

      • intersect

        HitRecord intersect(Ray r)
        Implement ray-surface intersection in this method. Implementations of this method need to make and return a HitRecord correctly, following the conventions assumed for HitRecord.
        Parameters:
        r - the ray used for intersection testing
        Returns:
        a hit record, should return null if there is no intersection
